rules_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature becomes untapped, you may pay {W}. If you do, tap target creature.
flavor_text: [i]As Granny Bofflenose laced the drow's cup with duskwort, she shook her head. A little faerie dust and she could have [/i][b]actually[i] [/b]just put the poor farmer to sleep for awhile.[/i]
